Articles.Content:
'What goes up, must come down.'

Said the teacher, with a frown.

'Nay!' Called Jeb. 'Not so fast!'

'I can stay up by rocket blast!'

Just a little something I thought up at half-past midnight.
Nice. It\'s just like Jeb to mouth off about breaking the laws of physics.

Well, actually, the teacher is wrong about Newtonian physics. A Rcoket blast can indeed put a rocket into orbit, and Newton knew and noted that with sufficient speed, you could stay up in an orbit. Still fun.

EDIT: Did not know this was a necro until it was too late. This was in the fan-works library. Sorry.
